Desc.entry: Working in partnership with Sheffield Futures (see separate entry), the service offers young people aged 13-25 years access to a free young-person centred counselling service. Initially referrals are via Sheffield futures but as capacity grows the service hopes to accommodate referals from other agencies as well as self-referrals. Part of a national registered charity.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
